name: Black stone
description: This is a very fun strategy game that tests players' strategies. The game style is very cute, and the game is simple and easy to use. You can use your brain to surround opponents with bombs. The lost little princess stumbled into a dangerous castle. On this castle, there are dangers everywhere, and there are dragons lurking everywhere. The dragons cause extremely high damage, and those who encounter them will accidentally die. The witty and brave princess needs to make good use of her bomb to eliminate the dragon. You can use the arrow keys to control character movement, and the space bar to place bombs. In your survival area, you need to predict the opponent's whereabouts to place bombs, and at the same time, you can also confuse the opponent. Come and try to see if you can escape from the living sky!
